lyrics.line2: Is it okay? Can I suck?
lyrics.line3: "No more, no more" is such a bad girl
lyrics.line4: I want to try it, I want to fill it up and vomit, I can still absolutely do it
lyrics.line5: The lowest and highest keep going back and forth
lyrics.line6: The fruit of anxiety that becomes sweet
lyrics.line7: No more development, even if I breathe with jealousy
lyrics.line9: If I'm with someone, it's just "what if"
lyrics.line10: Even if I act strong, I can't resist my feelings
lyrics.line11: Feelings I can feel even when apart
lyrics.line12: If we connect and confirm, we might die
lyrics.line13: Good things, sad things, painful things
lyrics.line14: Scream until I devour everything of you
lyrics.line16: Is it okay? Can I suck?
lyrics.line17: "No more, no more" is such a bad girl
lyrics.line18: I want to try it, I want to fill it up and vomit, I can still absolutely do it
lyrics.line20: I want to want it again and dry it up, that feeling
lyrics.line21: If I cry and forget, "Nice to meet you"
lyrics.line23: Please give me affection, I can still absolutely do it
lyrics.line24: I'm a vampire, come here first
lyrics.line25: If I honestly spill my secret feelings, it's just "right"
lyrics.line26: It doesn't split, but it's not leftover, gently block until morning
lyrics.line27: The repetitive dislike, being selfish is free
lyrics.line28: I'm being greedy and missing another chance
lyrics.line29: Even if I don't get sick, I want to make it happen
lyrics.line30: We might overlap and crush each other
lyrics.line31: Good things, sad things, painful things
lyrics.line32: Until I devour everything of you
lyrics.line33: It's not good, it's not fun, it doesn't feel good
lyrics.line34: Until drowning becomes a habit, scream
lyrics.line36: Is it okay? Can I suck?
lyrics.line37: "No more, no more" is such a bad girl
lyrics.line38: I want to try it, I want to fill it up and vomit, I can still absolutely do it
lyrics.line41: I want you to say "No more, no more"
lyrics.line42: I absolutely can't do it without you, let me do it
lyrics.line44: I want to want it again and dry it up, how many times is it now?
lyrics.line45: In bubbles that seem to show stars
lyrics.line47: Please give me an extension, I can still absolutely do it
lyrics.line48: You're also a vampire, come here first
